errors.callback-error: Authentication callback failed. Please try again.
errors.email-invalid: Please enter a valid email address.
errors.invalid-fields: Please check your input and try again.
errors.name-too-short: Name must be at least {min} characters long.
errors.oauth-not-linked: Email already in use with different provider.
errors.password-reset-failed: Password reset failed. Please try again.
errors.password-too-short: Password must be at least {min} characters long.
errors.password-unchanged: Your new password must be different from your current password.
errors.profile-update-failed: Failed to update profile. Please try again.
errors.rate-limit-exceeded: Too many requests. Please wait before trying again.
errors.security-settings-update-failed: Failed to update security settings. Please try again.
errors.signup-failed: Sign up failed. Please try again.
errors.token-expired: The token has expired. Please request a new one.
errors.token-invalid: The requested token was not found or is invalid.
errors.two-factor-code-expired: The two-factor code has expired. Please request a new one.
errors.two-factor-code-invalid: Invalid verification code. Please try again.
errors.two-factor-max-attempts: Too many failed attempts. Please request a new code.
errors.two-factor-required: Please enter the two-factor authentication code sent to your email.
errors.two-factor-provisioning-required: Complete two-factor setup before enabling this option.
errors.two-factor-session-missing: Two-factor session was not found. Please restart the login process.
errors.user-not-found: User with email {email} could not be found.
errors.verification-failed: Email verification failed. Please try again.
errors.verification-required: You need to verify your email before logging in.
errors.verification-required-for-password-reset: You need to verify your email before requesting a password reset.

success.email-verified: Email verified! You can now log in.
success.password-reset-sent: Password reset instructions have been sent to {email}.
success.password-updated: Your password has been updated successfully.
success.profile-updated: Your profile has been updated successfully.
success.two-factor-sent: The two-factor authentication code has been sent to your email.
success.two-factor-verified: Two-factor authentication successful! Redirecting to your dashboard...
success.verification-sent: A verification email has been sent to your address ({email}). Please check your inbox and follow the instructions to verify your account.

labels.signup-subtitle: Enter your details to create your account
labels.login-subtitle: Enter your email and password to sign in
labels.verification-success-subtitle: Your email has been verified successfully
labels.verification-failed-subtitle: We couldn't verify your email address
labels.verification-processing-subtitle: Please wait while we verify your email...
labels.forgot-password-subtitle: Enter your email address and we'll send instructions to reset your password.
labels.change-password-description: Update your password to keep your account secure
labels.two-factor-description: Add an extra layer of security to your account
labels.profile-description: Update your profile information and avatar.
labels.name: Name
labels.email-description: We'll use this to contact you. We will not share your email with anyone else.
labels.password-description: Must be at least 8 characters long.
labels.email-reset-description: We'll send a password reset link to this email address.
labels.two-factor-toggle-description: Use an authenticator app for additional security
labels.avatar-description: JPG, PNG or GIF. Max size {maxSize}.
labels.email-managed-description: Your email is managed by your OAuth provider and cannot be changed here.
labels.email-notifications-description: Receive email notifications about important updates.
labels.contact-support-description: Need help? Contact our support team.
labels.verify-2fa-description: We've sent a 6-digit verification code to {email}. Enter it below to continue.
labels.verify-2fa-subtitle: Enter the verification code sent to your email
